description: This file defines classes and functions for managing project templates, including template registration, project initialization, script execution, and copying template files with variable replacements. It supports various project types such as React, Angular, Django, and database schemas, and handles pre/post-processing scripts and environment configurations.

classes.name: ProcessingStep
classes.description: Enum for processing steps (Pre-processing and Post-processing).

classes.name: ProjectTemplate
classes.description: Abstract base class for project templates, providing initialization, structure generation, testing setup, and script execution.

classes.name: ProjectTemplateFactory
classes.description: Factory class for creating project template instances based on project type.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main orchestrator for project initialization, managing template registration and execution.

classes.name: FileSystemHelper
classes.description: Helper class for copying files and directories with variable replacements, including handling extra files and hidden files.

methods.name: _run_processing_script
methods.description: Runs a script in background or foreground depending on process type, manages status files, and handles errors.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the project by validating parameters, running pre/post scripts, generating structure, and setting up testing.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for post-processing to complete within a timeout, checking status file.
